resources.string: 温度を追加または編集
アプリフレームワーク
HSDP ログインはできません

[ja]This reference app is the starting point for any new patient medical or consumer mobile app. It is made up of configurable common components which are all part of the CDP2 Platform. It will help accelerate your app development, harmonize UX across Philips and ensures appropriate integration with HSDP.

[ja]AppInfra is the components top level module. It gathers all the modules delivered by the AppInfra Common Component into one single structure. AppInfra facilitates dependency injection into common components and other software pieces that make use of the AppInfra functionalities.

[ja]Whenever users find any difficulty in using the app, they can use the Consumer Care feature to get the issues resolved. The app provides a number of ways the users can access Consumer Care support, such as live chat, e-mail, call, tweet, Facebook post, and so on.

[ja]Connectivity feature in Reference App, provides the ability to pair the mobile application with a reference device using Bluetooth capability for capturing the data from the device to the mobile application.

[ja]Data Services is a common component that acts as a gateway to data core. It will provide synchronization with application data base for the below support the following types of data -\n
  • Moments, Consents, Insights, Push notification and user characteristics.

[ja]In App Purchase feature in Reference App, provides the ability to buy products from the app for the users, which would give users the convenience of shopping anytime-anywhere. This approach also will boost marketing and sales.

[ja]Product registration is a common component, which facilitates the user to create/login into My Philips account and Register a Normal Product where by providing CTN Number, Serial Number(Mandatory) and Date of Purchase.
[ja]UI Toolkit is a component that provides UI controls that are present in the designs provided by the design team on all the screens of the mobile application.

[ja]User registration feature in Reference App provides the ability of registering a new user accessing the mobile application, for logging into the application using valid organization social media specific credentials.

[ja]"Special offers, promotions and first hand information about new product releases.
Tailored for you!

Join 140.000 of your peers now!"

[ja]AppInfra is the component\'s top level module. It gathers all the modules delivered by the AppInfra Common Component into one single structure. AppInfra facilitates dependency injection into common components and other software pieces that make use of the AppInfra functionalities.

[ja]Connectivity feature in Reference App, provides the ability to pair the mobile application with a reference device using Bluetooth capability for capturing the data from the device to the mobile application

[ja]Whenever users find any difficulty in using the app, they can use the Consumer Care feature to get the issues resolved. The app provides a number of ways the users can access Consumer Care support, such as live chat, e-mail, call, tweet, Facebook post, and so on.

[ja]Data Services is a common component that acts as a gateway to data core. It will provide synchronization with application data base for the below support the following types of data: Moments, Consents, Insights, Push notification and user characteristics

[ja]In App Purchase feature in Reference App, provides the ability to buy products from the app for the users, which would give users the convenience of shopping anytime-anywhere. This approach also will boost marketing and sales

[ja]Product registration is a common component, which facilitates the user to create/login into My Philips account and Register a Normal Product where by providing CTN Number, Serial Number(Mandatory) and Date of Purchase
[ja]UI Toolkit is a component that provides UI controls that are present in the designs provided by the design team on all the screens of the mobile application

[ja]User registration feature in Reference App provides the ability of registering a new user accessing the mobile application, for logging into the application using valid organization / social media specific credentials
[ja]You can make Philips purchases or via 3rd party retailers here.
[ja]You can contact Philips consumer care here. Consumer Care is the destination for all Philips questions, product information and reviews.

[ja]This reference app is the starting point for any new patient medical or consumer mobile app. It is made up of configurable common components which are all part of the CDP2 Platform. It will help accelerate your app development, harmonize UX across Philips and ensures appropriate integration with HSDP.
[ja]Wait..While we fetch your sleep data from device

[ja]ReferenceApp is a base platform used by all propositions to develop and maintain features both generic and specific to the propositions. App infra, Data Gateway, App FWK, and UIToolkit allow Apps to be created from uApps and UI-less services/libraries. ReferenceApp acts as a foundation over which CDP2 uApps and proposition specific uApps are integrated to form individual apps.

[ja]This app integrates the common components required to develop new IoT solutions for acceleration across Philips. It is the first reference for the development of all new patient medical or consumer mobile apps.
[ja]Designers, developers and business leaders across Philips.
[ja]Reference App comprises all of the configurable common components that are part of the CDP2 platform.
[ja]It provides all the reference information and tools needed to accelerate and harmonize UX development and ensure appropriate HSDP integration.
[ja]The UX has been fully approved by Philips Design and will soon be in DLS.
[ja]The complete platform is tagged and delivers data to monitor &amp; improve your proposition.
[ja]The Security &amp; Privacy actions of the complete platform are fully in line with Philips rule.
[ja]Localization of your proposition is enabled by the platform, including China.
[ja]<html>The CDP<sup><small>2<small>&<sup> platform is fully integrated with HSDP and IT to ensure all functionalities are enabled end-2-end within the Philips landscape.</html>

モバイルアプリホーム
モバイルアプリホーム
無効なパラメーター値が入力または選択されました。適切なパラメーター値を選択してから再起動してください。
[ja]I allow Philips to store binary data
[ja]I allow Philips to use my mobile application usage statistics
[ja]I allow Philips to use my data for Coaching purposes
[ja]The actual content of the binary consent help text here
私は、アプリ機能の実現、アプリの改善、アプリのパーソナライズ、ソーシャルメディアとの統合、ならびに関連コンテンツおよび広告の表示を目的として、フィリップスが私のアプリデータを収集することを許可します。

cookie に関する通知

このアプリでは、Adobe Systems Software Ireland Limited（「Adobe」）が提供するアナリティクスサービス（「Adobe Analytics」）を使用します。Adobe Analytics では、アプリを介した全トラフィックパターンを解析するために、アプリ内に保存されるテキストファイルである「cookie」または類似の技術を使用します。cookie によって生成された、アプリの使用に関する情報を Adobe に伝送することにより、IP アドレスがジオローカライズ前に匿名化され、汎用 IP アドレスに置き換えてから保管されるように設定します。Adobe はフィリップスの代理として、アプリの使用の評価、フィリップス向けアプリアクティビティレポートのコンパイル、アプリアクティビティとアプリの使用に関連する他のサービスのフィリップスへの提供を目的として、この情報を使用します。Adobe は、同社が保持するその他のいかなるデータともお客様の IP アドレスを関連付けることはありません。お客様は、この画面を閉じた後で、Adobe およびフィリップスによるデータの収集および使用拒否を選択することができます。
[ja]The actual content of the coaching consent help text here

お客様にご同意いただいた場合、フィリップスグループ各社が、メール、SMS、モバイルアプリやソーシャルメディアなどのその他デジタルチャネルを利用して直接ご連絡させていただく場合があります。お客様の嗜好や行動に応じて最適な情報をご提供するために、当社では、お客様の個人データを分析したり結びつけたりする場合があります。それらのデータには次が含まれます： 

お客様にご提供いただいたデータ
お客様のお名前、生年月日、年齢、メールアドレス、住所、お住まいの国、性別、電話番号、ソーシャルメディアプロフィールなど、お客様のご希望でご提供いただいたデータ。

お客様とのやり取りで当社が入手したデータ
ソーシャルメディア、ウェブサイト、メール、アプリ、コネクテッド製品などのフィリップスのデジタルチャネルでのやり取りおよび使用に関するデータ。これらのデータには、IP アドレス、cookie、デバイス情報、お客様がクリックしたやり取り、位置情報の詳細、アクセスしたウェブサイトなども含まれます。

お客様はいつでも同意を取り消すことができます。
詳細については、当社のプライバシーに関する通知および cookie に関するポリシーをお読みください。
[ja]The actual content of the moment consent help text here
[ja]The actual content of the research and analytics consent help text here
[ja]I allow Philips to store my data in cloud
[ja]I allow Philips to use my data for Research and Analytics purposes

保証を 24 か月延長いたします\nフィリップス ショップで 10% 割引を適用いたします\n製品アクセサリを無料で差し上げます
保証延長契約に関するメールがお客様のメールアドレスに送信されました
保証期間が来年まで延長されました。
フィリップス ショップ
[ja]We’ve detected that you have rooted the device or jailbroken, thereby making it easier for others to access your data and no security on your application data.
[ja]We’ve detected that you have jailbroken and not activated screenlock, thereby making it easier for others to access your data. We recommend enabling your screenlock.
[ja]We’ve detected the screenlock of your mobile phone is to enabled, thereby making it easier for others to access your data. We recommend enabling your screenlock.
自分の嗜好やオンラインアクティビティに基づいたフィリップスのプロモーション情報の受信を希望します
設定を変更できるのは起動時のみです。変更するにはアプリを起動し直す必要があります。
ユーザーデータの更新時にエラーが発生しました。しばらくしてから再試行ください。
